description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. The initial analysis in regards to developing and implementing a project has already been conducted throughout the last 3-4 years and DSE has a concrete plan for installation of a plant, including involvement of local companies for electrical and civil works. The purpose of the project is therefore to complete the last and final stage of development of a 40 MW PV solar project in Embu, Kenya

Finalization of Belgen Embu Solar Power Ltd Kenya To complete the financial and technical development of a 40 MW PV solar project in Embu Kenya in collaboration with the local partner Belgen to a stage where our end-investor will pay for the project rights with the succeeding purpose of appointing DSE as the EPC manager in constructing the plant that will provide inexpensive green power for Kenya for the next 25 years. In addition, DSE will be a partial owner of the project, thus having long term commitment and income from the project.
